channel.title: Firefox download day - Guinness World Record
channel.description:
How are there not topics on this yet? Firefox 3 came out today.
http://www.spreadfirefox.com/en-US/worldrecord/firefox3
And in case you were living in a cave, they are trying to break the world record of most downloads in one day. But who cares about the record, just dl anyways; the new interface and supposed security improvements are very nice.

item.title: Firefox download day - Guinness World Record
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Infintry001, post:23, topic:213338”][quote author=Flamed n Ranged link=topic=280829.msg2290710#msg2290710 date=1214132422]
North Korea has 0 downloads, go figure =/
[/quote]

lmao I hope that’s sarcasm…[/quote]

No, it’s true. Take a look at the download map yourself.

Read full topic
